name: Beheading Home
description:
Move the head to find your body before you bleed out, find duct tape and powerups to complete the re-attachment.

This game was made during the Global Game Jam and completed within 48 hours.

Game Design / Level Design: Adam Klappers

Game Design / Sound / Animator:  Anders Wotzke

 Programmers: John Whitington, Thomas Whyatt

Music: https://www.bensound.com/ Silly song
